description: Gets information about an existing Amazon Q Business data source connector.

parameters.name: applicationId
parameters.description: The identifier of the Amazon Q Business application.

parameters.name: indexId
parameters.description: The identfier of the index used with the data source connector.

parameters.name: dataSourceId
parameters.description: The identifier of the data source connector.

nested_items.name: applicationId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the Amazon Q Business application.

nested_items.name: indexId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the index linked to the data source connector.

nested_items.name: dataSourceId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the data source connector.

nested_items.name: dataSourceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the data source.

nested_items.name: displayName
nested_items.description: The name for the data source connector.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The type of the data source connector. For example, S3.

nested_items.name: configuration
nested_items.description: The details of how the data source connector is configured.

nested_items.name: vpcConfiguration
nested_items.description: Configuration information for an Amazon VPC (Virtual Private Cloud) to connect to your data source.

nested_items.name: subnetIds
nested_items.description: A list of identifiers for subnets within your Amazon VPC. The subnets should be able to connect to each other in the VPC, and they should have outgoing access to the Internet through a NAT device.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: securityGroupIds
nested_items.description: A list of identifiers of security groups within your Amazon VPC. The security groups should enable Amazon Q Business to connect to the data source.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The Unix timestamp when the data source connector was created.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: The Unix timestamp when the data source connector was last updated.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description for the data source connector.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The current status of the data source connector. When the Status field value is FAILED, the ErrorMessage field contains a description of the error that caused the data source connector to fail.

nested_items.name: syncSchedule
nested_items.description: The schedule for Amazon Q Business to update the index.

nested_items.name: roleArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the role with permission to access the data source and required resources.

nested_items.name: errorMessage
nested_items.description: The message explaining the Amazon Q Business request error.

nested_items.name: errorCode
nested_items.description: The code associated with the Amazon Q Business request error.

nested_items.name: documentEnrichmentConfiguration
nested_items.description: Provides the configuration information for altering document metadata and content during the document ingestion process.

nested_items.name: inlineConfigurations
nested_items.description: Configuration information to alter document attributes or metadata fields and content when ingesting documents into Amazon Q Business.

nested_items.name: condition
nested_items.description: The condition used for the target document attribute or metadata field when ingesting documents into Amazon Q Business. You use this with DocumentAttributeTarget to apply the condition.

nested_items.name: key
nested_items.description: The identifier of the document attribute used for the condition.

nested_items.name: operator
nested_items.description: The identifier of the document attribute used for the condition.

nested_items.name: stringValue
nested_items.description: A string.

nested_items.name: stringListValue
nested_items.description: A list of strings.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: longValue
nested_items.description: A long integer value.

nested_items.name: dateValue
nested_items.description: A date expressed as an ISO 8601 string.

nested_items.name: key
nested_items.description: The identifier of the target document attribute or metadata field. For example, --Department' could be an identifier for the target attribute or metadata field that includes the department names associated with the documents.

nested_items.name: stringValue
nested_items.description: A string.

nested_items.name: stringListValue
nested_items.description: A list of strings.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: longValue
nested_items.description: A long integer value.

nested_items.name: dateValue
nested_items.description: A date expressed as an ISO 8601 string.

nested_items.name: attributeValueOperator
nested_items.description: TRUE to delete the existing target value for your specified target attribute key. You cannot create a target value and set this to TRUE.

nested_items.name: documentContentOperator
nested_items.description: TRUE to delete content if the condition used for the target attribute is met.

nested_items.name: preExtractionHookConfiguration
nested_items.description: Provides the configuration information for invoking a Lambda function in Lambda to alter document metadata and content when ingesting documents into Amazon Q Business.

nested_items.name: invocationCondition
nested_items.description: The condition used for when a Lambda function should be invoked.

nested_items.name: key
nested_items.description: The identifier of the document attribute used for the condition.

nested_items.name: operator
nested_items.description: The identifier of the document attribute used for the condition.

nested_items.name: stringValue
nested_items.description: A string.

nested_items.name: stringListValue
nested_items.description: A list of strings.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: longValue
nested_items.description: A long integer value.

nested_items.name: dateValue
nested_items.description: A date expressed as an ISO 8601 string.

nested_items.name: lambdaArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Lambda function during ingestion. For more information, see Using Lambda functions for Amazon Q Business document enrichment.

nested_items.name: s3BucketName
nested_items.description: Stores the original, raw documents or the structured, parsed documents before and after altering them. For more information, see Data contracts for Lambda functions.

nested_items.name: roleArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of a role with permission to run PreExtractionHookConfiguration and PostExtractionHookConfiguration for altering document metadata and content during the document ingestion process.

nested_items.name: postExtractionHookConfiguration
nested_items.description: Provides the configuration information for invoking a Lambda function in Lambda to alter document metadata and content when ingesting documents into Amazon Q Business.

nested_items.name: invocationCondition
nested_items.description: The condition used for when a Lambda function should be invoked.

nested_items.name: key
nested_items.description: The identifier of the document attribute used for the condition.

nested_items.name: operator
nested_items.description: The identifier of the document attribute used for the condition.

nested_items.name: stringValue
nested_items.description: A string.

nested_items.name: stringListValue
nested_items.description: A list of strings.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: longValue
nested_items.description: A long integer value.

nested_items.name: dateValue
nested_items.description: A date expressed as an ISO 8601 string.

nested_items.name: lambdaArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Lambda function during ingestion. For more information, see Using Lambda functions for Amazon Q Business document enrichment.

nested_items.name: s3BucketName
nested_items.description: Stores the original, raw documents or the structured, parsed documents before and after altering them. For more information, see Data contracts for Lambda functions.

nested_items.name: roleArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of a role with permission to run PreExtractionHookConfiguration and PostExtractionHookConfiguration for altering document metadata and content during the document ingestion process.

nested_items.name: mediaExtractionConfiguration
nested_items.description: The configuration for extracting information from media in documents for the data source.

nested_items.name: imageExtractionConfiguration
nested_items.description: The configuration for extracting semantic meaning from images in documents. For more information, see Extracting semantic meaning from images and visuals.

nested_items.name: imageExtractionStatus
nested_items.description: Specify whether to extract semantic meaning from images and visuals from documents.

nested_items.name: audioExtractionConfiguration
nested_items.description: Configuration settings for extracting and processing audio content from media files.

nested_items.name: audioExtractionStatus
nested_items.description: The status of audio extraction (ENABLED or DISABLED) for processing audio content from files.

nested_items.name: videoExtractionConfiguration
nested_items.description: Configuration settings for extracting and processing video content from media files.

nested_items.name: videoExtractionStatus
nested_items.description: The status of video extraction (ENABLED or DISABLED) for processing video content from files.
